courseDescription:
Dentistry is as vital as any other branch of medicine. The importance of dental health cannot be overemphasised. The practice of good dental health can prevent many dental problems which cause decreased quality of life and possible medical complications. As a dental assistant, you are responsible for executing critical functions in the dental office. Therefore, it is sensible to become acquainted with dentistry, dental terms, practice and procedures. The success of any dental operation relies on you, as a dental assistant, diligently carrying out your responsibilities most effectively and efficiently. This course examines how dentistry evolved and the various types of dentists you find. Every profession has standards of practice concerning its region of operation. This course teaches the standard of practice attainable in the United Kingdom, which serves as your guiding principle in your profession as a dental assistant.

The duties and responsibilities of a dental assistant require a combination of clinical and administrative tasks. One of your responsibilities includes acting as a link between the front office and the clinical aspect of the dental office. To dispel the public's popular perceived notions about dentistry as an anxious experience, you need to possess the prerequisite skills and qualifications. Discover a dental assistant's skills, qualifications and duties and their significant effects in maintaining an ambient dental environment. You will research preventive dentistry and your role in educating patients on different preventive techniques. We explore oral nutrition and how you can use this knowledge to educate and make recommendations to your patients regarding dental nutrition. 

Familiarise yourself with the head and neck anatomy, physiology and tooth morphology. This knowledge will ensure that each patient receives high-quality dental care. We will discuss charting, the process of recording the patient’s oral cavity conditions using colours, symbols and numbers. Learn to record a patient’s information using dental charts, either manually or technologically. We then guide you on the efficient use and maintenance of dental tools. Being knowledgeable about a subject sets you apart from one who is not. Being adequately informed about dental practice and seeing you succeed as a dental assistant is the sole aim of this course. We prepare you to become an outstanding professional dental assistant. This course is for everyone, whether you are considering a career as a dental assistant, a dental health student or perhaps simply want to learn about dentistry and oral hygiene. This diploma course is perfect for you. So sign up and start this course today!
